inputs.name: Ground Floor Room Length Divisions
inputs.description: Number of rooms on the x-axis of the ground floor.

inputs.name: Ground Floor Room Width Divisions
inputs.description: Number of rooms on the y-axis of the ground floor.

inputs.name: Typical Floor Rooms Length Divisions
inputs.description: Number of rooms on the x-axis of typical floors.

inputs.name: Typical Floor Rooms Width Divisions
inputs.description: Number of rooms on the y-axis of typical floors.

inputs.name: Plan Setback
inputs.description: Plan setback from the edge of all floors.

outputs.name: Ground Floor Room Quantity
outputs.description: Quantity of rooms on the ground floor.

outputs.name: Typical Floor Room Quantity
outputs.description: Quantity of rooms on the ground floor.

outputs.name: Upper Floors Room Quantity
outputs.description: Quantity of rooms on all upper floors.

outputs.name: Upper Floor Total Area
outputs.description: Total area for all upper floors.
